title: Emerging Market Pain, U.S. Most Exposed Nation, Jefferies Dealmakers Keep Winning
itunes:title: Emerging Market Pain, U.S. Most Exposed Nation, Jefferies Dealmakers Keep Winning
description:
Carol speaks to Damian Sassower, Bloomberg Intelligence Fixed-Income Strategist, about the correction in emerging markets. Corey Thomas, CEO of Rapid7, talks about the state of cybersecurity and the National Exposure Index. Ann Miletti, Portfolio Manager at Wells Fargo Asset Management, explains why to invest in energy. Laura Keller, Bloomberg NewsFinancial Reporter, discusses how Jefferies fees from advising on mergers and selling new securities have increased for the seventh time in a row. And we Drive to the Close with Matt Schreiber, President and Chief Investment Strategist at WBI Investments. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
